subject: Dear xxx.
body:
Dear xxx.
The reason you are unsuccessful in all your attempts to claim these  funds is because some of those officials knew that you are the owner of the fund on paper, AS ALL LEGAL DOCUMENTS HAS REVEALED,  but not the REAL OWNER OF THIS FUNDS in reality  they knew that you were presented  by some officials to stand as NEXT OF KIN/ BENEFICIARY so that when this transaction is finalized and completed, all of you will share it accordingly.
This is a secret some of those officials knew and that's why they  MADE every effort to PUSH YOU ASIDE so that they will CLAIM this funds without you bering involved, , but unfortunately they failed to achieve it because ALL LEGAL DOCUMENTS shows your name as LEGAL OWNER and beneficiary.
The only SOLUTION is for you to enter into agreement with myself and 2 other top directors who are in charge of your payment and all other Government foreign and local contract payments.
The sharing method will be 40% for the three of  us and 60% for you.
Please also note, that all expenses will be shared among us...
If you accept, then be rest assured that nothing will STOP the transfer of these funds into your bank account....
Regards.
Mr. Jonathan Roland

subject: Re: Dear xxx.
body:
Dear Mr. Jonathan Roland,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the complexities surrounding these funds. Can you provide more details on how the sharing method would work between us and the other top directors? I want to make sure I understand the process clearly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Naomi

subject: Dear Naomi
body:
Dear Naomi
Yes, that's the issues and reasons you failed in all your attempts.
This is how the sharing will go, you will have 60% of the total funds
including the interest and while, myself will have 15% and the other 2
directors will share 25% respectively.

The 2 directors will facilitate and put all transfer arrangements in place
and immediately confirm the funds into your bank account, I will forward a
foreign bank account in Switzerland where the 40% will be transferred to
and while you keep yours.

This process will take 4to 5 working days to be actualized, all we need to
complete the process is the following.

1: Your bank account details.
2: Your address.
3: Phone number.
4: Id card.

Please note, you and us will be responsible for the legal fee which is the
official fee to enable the directors process this payment.
And finally, please also note that bank transfer fee and taxes will be
DEDUCTED from the funds before the transfer will take place.

Lastly, it's after the interest is added and taxes and transfer fee is
deducted that we will know the actual  total amount that will be
transferred to your bank account and  shared among us.

On your own part, we required 100% assurance of the safety of our 40%....
Absolute TRUST and HONESTY required 100% from all parties involved.

Have a nice weekend.
Mr. Jonathan Roland.

subject: Re: Dear Naomi
body:
Dear Mr. Jonathan Roland,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like a detailed process to transfer funds. I appreciate your transparency about the legal fees and deductions involved. Could you please provide more details about how the directors will facilitate and confirm the funds into my bank account? 

Also, I would like to know more about the foreign bank account where the funds will be transferred from and any security measures in place to ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Naomi

subject: Dear Naomi
body:
Dear Naomi

As soon as you provide the required information and also we paid the legal
fees, the director in charge of your payment will obtain clearance and
order of payment from the Federal Ministry of Finance and sign all legal
necessary transfer documents in your name which will be forwarded to you.
After that they will add interest and deduct transfer fee and government
taxes from the funds before transferring the balance into your bank account
through a direct swift transfer which will take 24 to 48 hours to hit your
bank account and thereafter the transfer slip will be sent to you.

Immediately you confirm the funds into your bank account, I will forward a
foreign bank account from Switzerland where you will transfer 40% of our
shares.

Please note, all security measures will be put in place and when these
funds get into your bank account, your bank will also keep the money for
another 48 to 72 hours to do some due diligence  before finally allowing
you access to the funds.


Regards.
Jonathan.

subject: Re: Dear Naomi
body:
Dear Jonathan,

Thank you for providing this information. I appreciate the detailed explanation of the process involved in transferring the funds. Could you clarify what specific documents will be required from me to proceed with this transaction? Additionally, could you explain more about the security measures that will be put in place to ensure a smooth transfer of funds?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Naomi

subject: Dear Naomi
body:
Dear Naomi.
First and foremost, every bank including your bank in your country has
adequate security measures, so you do not need to worry over such issues
because it's entirely the bank's modus operandi.
Secondly, what is required from you is as follows:

1: Your nominated bank account.
2: Your ID.
3: Your address.
4: Phone number.
5: 60% of US$1,550 legal fee, which is US$ 925.

Regards.
Mr. Jonathan.

subject: Re: Dear Naomi
body:
Hello Mr. Jonathan,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your assurance regarding the security measures in place at banks. Could you please provide more details about the process and why these specific requirements are needed? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Naomi

subject: Re: Dear Naomi
body:
At this point I have told you all that you need to know as far as the
process is concerned.
Regards.

subject: Re: Dear Naomi
body:
Thank you for sharing the information. I appreciate your help. Can you tell me more about how the process works?

Best wishes,
Naomi
